message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.NE 

The paper presents a method for training policies in reinforcement learning, which is a subfield of machine learning. The method is based on random search, which is a common optimization technique in machine learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.RO (Robotics). The paper also discusses control theory, which suggests cs.SY (Systems and Control) as another possible sub-category. Finally, the paper evaluates the performance of the method on benchmark tasks, which suggests cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) as a possible sub-category.
